titleStmt.title: Here is a shorte resytal or certayne holy doctours whych proueth that the naturall body of christ is not conteyned in the Sacrame[n]t of the Lordes supper but fyguratyuely, collected in myter by Ihon Mardeley
Here is a shorte resytal or certayne holy doctours whych proueth that the naturall body of christ is not conteyned in the Sacrament of the Lordes supper but fyguratyvely.
titleStmt.author: Mardeley, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Sainct Andrevves in the VVaredrop, by Thomas Raynalde,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
